means: 使无能力( disable的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Rheumatoid arthritis is perhaps the most severe and disabling type of the disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 类风湿性关节炎可能是其中最严重,最能致残的一种类型.

sentence.Network_en: There was an error disabling the Inbox Assistant rules.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁用收件箱助理程序规则时出错.

sentence.Network_en: Password protection prevents unauthorized attempts at disabling protection or changing settings.
sentence.Network_cn: 密码保护功能阻止未被授权的用户完成禁用保护或更改设置的操作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ⑵癫痫发作必须是致残的 (disabling) 频繁发作，每月 3-4 次以上，并影响个人的生活质量 ( 日常生活、学习和工作及社交接触 ) 。

失能文字 disabled Text禁止，去能 disabling-
a migraine headache can cause disabling pain . people may not feel back to normal hours or even days .偏头痛可以引起致残性疼痛。患者也许会感觉数小时甚至数日都无法恢复正常。

entry.def: If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life.

example.ex: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her...
example.tran: 她遭受这么严重的肌腱损伤，这实际上让她残废了。

example.ex: Although disabled by polio during the Second World War, Proctor was also a first-rate helmsman.
example.tran: 二战期间尽管身患小儿麻痹症，普罗克特仍不失为一流的舵手。

entry.tran: （通常指暂时地）使无效，使不能正常运转
entry.def: If someone or something disables a system or mechanism, they stop it working, usually temporarily.

example.ex: ...if you need to disable a car alarm.
example.tran: 如果你需要暂停汽车报警功能

means.word_mean: 1. that cripples or disables or incapacitates;
2. depriving of legal right; rendering legally disqualified;

sentences.sentence: "certain disabling restrictions disqualified him for citizenship"

auth_sentence.content: Like depression, fear is also a disabling condition.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like depression, fear is also a disabling condition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like depression, fear is also a disabling condition.

auth_sentence.content: Without treatment arthritis can become increasingly painful and disabling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Without treatment arthritis can become increasingly painful and disabling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Without treatment arthritis can become increasingly painful and disabling.

auth_sentence.content: Clearly, not every charity for disabling conditions has similar priorities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clearly, not every charity for disabling conditions has similar priorities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clearly, not every charity for disabling conditions has similar priorities.
